Kim Eui Seo

Korean: 김의서

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Kim Eui-seo
Native name:
김의서

Introduction

Kim Eui Seo is a South Korean independent singer-songwriter and musician. He is a member of the band WESTOF. He is a contestant on the survival show Undercover.

Oct 24, 2022
